```{r setup, include = FALSE, cache = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(RefManageR)
BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE, style = "markdown", cite.style = "authoryear",
           bib.style = "authoryear",hyperlink = FALSE)
```


```{r,echo=FALSE}
bib1 <- ReadBib("bibTeX/peer-review.bibtex", check = FALSE)
bib2 <- ReadBib("bibTeX/preprints.bibtex", check = FALSE)
bib3 <- ReadBib("bibTeX/presentations.bibtex", check = FALSE)
bib4 <- ReadBib("bibTeX/reports.bibtex", check = FALSE)
bib5 <- ReadBib("bibTeX/datasets.bibtex", check = FALSE)
bib6 <- ReadBib("bibTeX/code-and-software.bibtex", check = FALSE)
NoCite(bib = bib1, 1:length(bib1), .opts = list(hyperlink = FALSE))
NoCite(bib = bib2, 1:length(bib2), .opts = list(hyperlink = FALSE))
NoCite(bib = bib3, 1:length(bib3), .opts = list(hyperlink = FALSE))
NoCite(bib = bib4, 1:length(bib4), .opts = list(hyperlink = FALSE))
NoCite(bib = bib5, 1:length(bib5), .opts = list(hyperlink = FALSE))
NoCite(bib = bib6, 1:length(bib6), .opts = list(hyperlink = FALSE))
```

This is an R Markdown document. This is an example of a citation in the text `r AutoCite(bib2, "Bland_Impact_RLE_preprint", .opts = list(hyperlink = "to.doc"))`. And this is another `r AutoCite(bib5, publisher = "figshare", .opts = list(hyperlink = FALSE))`

**Peer reviewed**

```{r results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
PrintBibliography(bib1, .opts = list(check.entries = FALSE, max.names=100, sorting = "ydnt"))
```
